contents:
@北风那个吹: +1.

徵用賓館用作隔離區已經施行了。早在從鑽石公主號上撤回加拿大人的時候就是這樣處置的。https://www.mynbc5.com/article/passengers-from-quarantined-cruise-ship-in-japan-arrive-just-north-of-new-york-to-begin-14-day-quarantine/31039037

鑽石公主號上那批被隔離觀察的3月6日已經解除隔離。https://ottawa.ctvnews.ca/quarantined-cruise-ship-passengers-released-from-nav-centre-in-cornwall-1.4841594

NAV 將繼續用作隔離中心：https://www.standard-freeholder.com/news/local-news/quarantine-order-at-nav-centre-in-cornwall-to-stand-until-april-19
